name: Dumb Town
description:
A diorama/simulation of a living town with a day/night cycle and limited interactivity.

Controls :

  • + key : speed up
  • - key : slow down
  • mouse scrollwheel : zoom in/out
  • right-click + drag : pan the map while zoomed in

City assets by Kenney.nl
People assets by finalbossblues.itch.io
